name: TMIRadio
0:
”Alexa play t. m. i. radio”
”Alexa open t. m. i. radio”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: t. m. i. radio
Developer Terms of Use
des:
T.M.I Radio is short for The Music Industry. It is a station that experiences the difference in what it is about from other online radio stations.
We have no DJ's or presenters on the station and we also have the station automated 24 hours a day. We are also heavily involved in the gaming world with certain games like Grand Theft Auto V under the roleplay scene and we promote certain servers.
We play music from 1980 to today's chart countdown. We also have our own request section that listeners can use to select their own tunes to be played from our extensive library collection.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
